Description: Sets the path to the DOOM II IWAD file to use. 'Default' assumes that AMP manages the download from Steam of the client files. If that is disabled under Updates, select 'Custom' and specify Custom IWAD Path accordingly
Sets a custom path to use for the IWAD Path, if 'Custom' is selected
Sets a space-separated list of files to load with the server. The files can be WAD, PK3, PK7, ZIP, 7z, BEX, BEH, DEH or CLD files
Sets the display name the server has on the master server list
If set, clients must supply the Join Password in order to join the gam. Clients without the proper join password may still spectate freely
Sets the join password clients must supply in order to join the game, if Force Join Password is enabled
If set, clients must supply the Server Password in order to connect to the server. Clients without the proper password may not connect at all
Sets the password clients must supply to connect to the server, if Force Server Password is enabled
Sets an e-mail address for clients to send an email to the administrator of the server
Sets a message of the day (MOTD) on the server, a welcome message printed on clients upon connection
Sets a website for the server. Used as the primary download location for any PWADs
Sets the maximum number of clients (players and spectators) that may connect to the server at one time
Sets the maximum number of players that can join the game at one time. Others clients will be forced to spectate
Sets how many clients with the same IP can enter the server at one time
List of IPs of clients who are considered to be administrators on the server. Administrators can bypass the Client Limit and cannot be votekicked
Semi-colon seaprated list of files that define a whitelist of IPs that are exempt from bans and votekicks
Semi-colon seaprated list of files that define a blacklist of banned IPs
Inactive (AFK) players will be forced to spectators after the specified time period. 0 = disabled
Sets the [control](https://wiki.zandronum.com/Air_Control) a player has over their direction while in the air
If set, allows mods to ban players using the [BanFromGame](https://wiki.zandronum.com/BanFromGame) ACS function. Requires development version 3.2-alpha and above
Determines if clients are allowed to send private messages to each other or the host of the server
Controls whether voice chat is enabled and who can use it. Requires development version 3.2-alpha and above
If set, enables proximity-based voice chat. Requires development version 3.2-alpha and above
Controls the distance at which proximity voice chat is no longer audible. Requires development version 3.2-alpha and above
Controls the distance at which proximity voice chat will begin rolling off (becoming quieter). Requires development version 3.2-alpha and above
If set, the server will broadcast to the local area network
If set, clients can use cheat commands on the server. Use with care!
Sets the damage multiplier applied to all damage players receive from monsters
If set, [Voodoo dolls](https://doomwiki.org/wiki/Voodoo_doll) will be supported online
If set, all voodoo dolls are spawned when the map is loaded, regardless of whether the corresponding player is in the server. Dolls will also not be assigned to any player

DisplayName: Coop Unassigned Voodoo Dolls For Specified Players
Description: Controls how many players a voodoo doll caters for. Dolls are spawned for players 1 to the number specified

Sets the country of the server as shown in server browsers (though not all browsers support this feature). Use an [ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3), 'automatic', or 'unknown'
If set, the server will automatically set certain dmflags for certain game modes. In coop they will be cleared
If set, disables auto-triggering of certain health items for Heretic, Hexen, and Strife
If set, prevents clients from spying on other players
If set, players cannot kill themselves with the Z kill command
If set, players may not Z kill themselves
Controls the style for how items from monsters are dropped on the floor
If set, the banlist will be actually enforced
If set, the server will enforce the master server's banlist
Sets how fast weapons fire
Sets how strong gravity is present in the game world. Higher values create stronger gravity
If set, players may not drop items. Items may never be dropped in duels
If set, enables client commands flooding protection
If set, and a logfile with the same name is present, the server will add to the log file instead of overwriting
If set, when generating a new log file, the server will append the time and date to the end of the logfile name
If set, the server logfile is written containing time stamps at every new line
If set, the current date will be prepended to the per-line timestamp of the logfile
If set, the server measures how much bandwidth is used for both ACS scripts and actor classes. The result can be printed with the command 'dumptrafficmeasure'
If set, all chat messages within the server console contain a 'CHAT' tag before the typed message
Sets how much data can be stored in a UDP packet

DisplayName: Use Map Settings Possession Hold Time
Description: If set, the hold time set in a map definition takes precedence over sv_possessionholdtime
If set, the server uses an authentication mechanism to ensure clients have the correct WADs
Flood throttle for server browser queries
If set, in cooperative game modes, players will be spawned at random player starts
If set, the server will use a map rotation list to determine the campaign
Sets the map rotation list. Format: addmap <mapname>. One line per map. Requires Map Rotation to be enabled. Will be overridden if Random Map Rotation is enabled
DefaultValue: ["addmap MAP01","addmap MAP02","addmap MAP03","addmap MAP04","addmap MAP05","addmap MAP06","addmap MAP07","addmap MAP08","addmap MAP09","addmap MAP10","addmap MAP11","addmap MAP12","addmap MAP13","addmap MAP14","addmap MAP15","addmap MAP16","addmap MAP17","addmap MAP18","addmap MAP19","addmap MAP20","addmap MAP21","addmap MAP22","addmap MAP23","addmap MAP24","addmap MAP25","addmap MAP26","addmap MAP27","addmap MAP28","addmap MAP29","addmap MAP30","addmap MAP31"]

Description: If set, the server will randomize the map rotation list instead of advancing through maps in sequence. Requires Map Rotation to be enabled
Sets how long a player must wait after dying before they can respawn
If set, displays the IPs of clients querying the server (for debugging)
If set, shows certain warning messages (for debugging)
If set, the server console will contain a timestamp for all messages
Sets the format for console timestamps
Affects the behaviour of auto-aiming
Enables the skip correction which tries to smooth the movement of lagging players. 0 = disabled
If set, when the time limit is hit and all teams have the same score, sudden death commences. The first team to score wins
Sets the warm-up duration in survival games
If set, allows players to pickup ammunition past maximum amounts
If set, the server will identify itself to the master server and will be broadcasted in the server list
If set, instead of processing all commands of a client immediately, they are stored in a 'ticbuffer', and processed up to two sets per server tic. Changeable on experimental builds only
Specifies additional [command line arguments](https://wiki.zandronum.com/Command-line_parameters) that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care
Sets how many players are needed in the server in order to call a vote
Sets the cooldown between votes. 0 = cooldown disabled
Manages how votes take place
If set, disables all Z changemap votes. However, map votes may still be called unless No Map Vote is set
If set, disables all votes to change the duel limit
If set, disables all DMFlag votes
If set, disables all votes to force players to Spec by voting
If set, disables all votes to change the frag limit
If set, disables all votes to kick players
If set, disables all Z map votes. However, changemap votes may still be called unless No Change Map Vote is set
If set, disables all Z nextmap votes. However, nextsecret votes may still be called unless No Next Secret Vote is set
If set, disables all Z nextsecret votes
If set, disables all votes to change the point limit
If set, disables all votes to change the time limit
If set, disables all votes to change the LMS win limit
Sets the [2 or 3 digit version number](https://zandronum.com/downloads/) for a specific server version to install. Empty = latest version. Update the server after changing this setting
If set, DOOM II client files (Steam App ID 2280) will not be downloaded from Steam when the server is updated. The DOOM II IWAD file must be provided manually, and the IWAD Path set accordingly
